name: 2014 Once Upon A Time Sampler
description: Join us in 2014 stitching up our year long sampler- Once Upon A Time! Once Upon A Time Sampler is our kawaii rendition of our favorite fairytales and folklore stories! This is our cutest sampler yet! It's filled with lots of sweet little details, including a dreamy lace border. This border has castles! fleur de lis! mushrooms! and of course...crowns! You'll be stitching up stories like: • Snow White & Seven Dwarves • Jack & The Beanstalk • Hansel & Gretel ...the rest is a surprise! We can't tell you all the details- it's a mystery pattern! Finished Once Upon a Time pattern measures: 11.5" wide x 17.75" tall and 173 stitches wide x 246 stitches tall on 14 ct aida or 28 ct linen. Here's how it works: The pdf you receive with your purchase includes a welcome letter with a supply list. There is NO stitching until January 10th to allow adequate time for you to purchase supplies. Be sure to read the welcome note throughly. It is full of important information! On January 10th 2014 at 12:05 am PST, you'll receive a email with a link to download the next pdf. This PDF Pattern contains: • A black and white chart • A color chart • A very important and helpful guide to beginning cross stitching. The pdfs will be automatically emailed to you on: January 10th at 12:05 am PST February 1st at 12:05 am PST March 1st at 12:05 am PST April 1st at 12:05 am PST May 1st at 12:05 am PST June 1st at 12:05 am PST July 1st at 12:05 am PST August 1st at 12:05 am PST September 1st at 12:05 am PST October at 1st 12:05 am PST November at 1st 12:05 am PST December at 1st 12:05 am PST You will find specific instructions on what to do if you accidentally delete one or need to change your email address in the welcome letter. This is a ONE time purchase for a full year's worth of patterns! This is not a monthly subscription, nor will you be billed again. The $19.95 is one time fee. After March 1st the pattern price rises to $24.95 for the remainder of the year. For this pattern you need: • 28 count Cashel Linen in "Doubloon" but you can also purchase it in 14 count Aida. The finished project will be the same size. You can click the link to be directed to the fabric. • Embroidery floss. The pattern contains both DMC & Cosmo color numbers. We will be using 3 skeins of Weeks Dye Works colors, however DMC/Cosmo substitutions are noted. • Q-snap Embroidery Frame • Scissors • Size 26 Tapestry Needles Click Here to find Weeks Dye Works near you. PLEASE NOTE: YOU ARE BUYING AN INSTANT DOWNLOAD PDF PATTERN. Upon completion of your purchase you will receive an email to download the pattern. The email is automatically sent to the email address associated with your paypal account! The link will expire after 3 tries so be sure to save it to your computer, smartphone or ipad. You will need adobe reader to open our patterns.

name: GIFT 2014 Once Upon A Time Sampler
description:
Have a friend that you want to stitch-a-long with in 2014?

Want to give the gift of cross stitch?

Know someone who wants to learn to cross stitch?

Sign them up for the 2014 Once Upon A Time Sampler!

After purchasing this product, please email us at: thefrostedpumpkinstitchery at gmail dot com with the recipient's email address and your message! 

We'll take care of the rest! Woohoo!

name: 12 Days of Christmas PDF Cross Stitch Pattern
description: On the first day of Christmas my true love gave to me.... Ring in Christmas by joining us in stitching up The 12 Days of Christmas! We'll be starting with a fancy winter themed lace border featuring mittens, bells, trees, snowflakes and musical notes! Then beginning November 29th we'll start filling in the center with our kawaii rendition of the 12 Days of Christmas song! ....8 maids are milking.... Our sneak peek teaser image shows the lace border stitched in hand dyed Weeks Dye Works floss, our sweetest little milk maid and her trusty cow! We will be using hand dyed fabric with glitter thread woven into it, hand dyed floss and solid colors for this project. If you choose to not to use hand dyed fabric and floss, alternate supplies are listed within the PDF. However, hand dyed flosses really shine in this project! Finished 12 Days of Christmas pattern measures: 11.1" wide x 9.6" tall, 155 stitches wide x 134 stitches tall on 14 ct aida or 28 ct linen. This PDF Pattern contains: • A list of all the colors & materials needed to complete the sampler. The color list contains numbers for both Cosmo & DMC. • A black and white chart • A color chart • A very important and helpful guide to beginning cross stitching including clickable links on where we like to purchase our supplies For this pattern you need: • 14 ct aida or 28 ct linen/evenweave-white is NOT recommended due to the amount white floss used within the pattern. • Embroidery floss. The pattern contains both DMC & Cosmo color numbers. • Embroidery hoop or frame • Scissors • Tapestry or Cross Stitch Needles Click here to purchase a Cosmo brand embroidery floss bundle kit from The Workroom - a shop in Toronto, Canada Click Here to find Weeks Dye Works near you. Click here to find the hand dyed fabric we used for this project. PLEASE NOTE: YOU ARE BUYING AN INSTANT DOWNLOAD PDF PATTERN. Upon completion of your purchase you will receive an email to download the pattern. The link will expire after 3 tries so be sure to save it to your computer, smartphone or ipad. YOU WILL NEED ADOBE READER TO OPEN OUR PDFS.

name: Christmas on Gingerbread Lane PDF Cross Stitch Pattern
description: Finished Christmas on Gingerbread Lane pattern measures: 11.1" wide x 9" tall, 155 stitches wide x 126 stitches tall on 14 ct aida or 28 ct linen. With this project you'll be stitching up a gingerbread themed neighborhood, complete with ice skaters, snowmen, decorated houses and a Christmas countdown. The bottom of the project contains a cute scalloped frame with the numbers 1-25 counting down until Christmas, the 25 is extra special because it's Christmas Day! We used hand dyed fabric with glitter thread woven into it, hand dyed floss, metallic floss and solid colors for this project. If you choose to not to use hand dyed fabric and floss, alternate supplies are listed within the PDF. However, hand dyed flosses really shine in this project! This PDF Pattern contains: • A list of all the colors & materials needed to complete the sampler. The color list contains numbers for both Cosmo & DMC. • A black and white chart • A color chart • A very important and helpful guide to beginning cross stitching including clickable links on where we like to purchase our supplies For this pattern you need: • 14 ct aida or 28 ct linen/evenweave-white is NOT recommended due to the amount white floss used within the pattern. • Embroidery floss. The pattern contains both DMC & Cosmo color numbers. • Embroidery hoop or frame • Scissors • Tapestry or Cross Stitch Needles Click here to purchase a Cosmo brand embroidery floss bundle kit from The Workroom - a shop in Toronto, Canada Click Here to find Weeks Dye Works near you. name: Halloween Spooky Sampler PDF Cross Stitch Pattern
description: It's our most favorite time of the year! HALLOWEEN!!!!! We are so in love with all things Halloween, it's truly the best! This project uses 4 colors of hand dyed Weeks Dye Works Floss, in addition to solid colors & hand dyed Legacy Lugana. The PDF does contain substitutions for these materials if you choose not to use them, but we hope you will! They are so beautiful and create a really unique look! Finished Halloween Spooky Sampler measures: 8" wide x 8" tall on 16ct aida or 32 ct linen. This PDF Pattern contains: • A list of all the colors & materials needed to complete the sampler. The color list contains numbers for Weeks Dye Works, DMC & Cosmo brands of floss. • A black and white chart • A very important and helpful guide to cross stitching For this pattern you need: • 16 ct adia or 32 ct linen/evenweave-white is NOT recommended due to the amount white floss used within the pattern. Sample is stitched using Legacy Lugana by Picture This Plus. • Embroidery floss. The pattern contains the Weeks Dye Works, DMC & Cosmo color numbers. • Embroidery hoop or frame • Scissors • Tapestry or Cross Stitch Needles This pattern is 100% Spooky Halloween Fun! name: 2013 Woodland Sampler PDF Cross Stitch Pattern
description: Monthly Woodland Sampler is our 2013 cross stitch club! With this purchase you will automatically receive all the previous months' patterns! You can sign up at ANY time & be up to date with our stitch along! It is a one time payment for 12 months of patterns plus a bonus block for the year! Here's what you can expect this year: A friendly email sent out at 12:15am on the 1st of each month containing that month's pattern. Each month you'll fill in a square or rectangle and by next December, you'll have a finished Woodland Sampler! Adorable! This year the design is larger, still completely 100% beginner friendly but fun enough for an experienced cross stitcher. Each month we'll post hints on our facebook page and if you are the first person to guess the following month's theme correctly, you win a pattern of your choice! January: Deer Couple February: Raccoon March: Mushroom in a Terrarium April: Jackalope May: Gnome June: Lightning Bug July: Fox August: Skunk September: Hedgehog October: Owl November: Squirrel The Coziest Woodland Cabin: Squirrel Finished Woodland Sampler measures: 7" wide by 17" tall. 101 wide x 236 tall stitches on 14 ct aida or 28 ct linen. The PDF that is included with your purchase today contains: • A list of all the colors & materials you need for the full year. Both DMC & Cosmo brands of floss are listed. • A black and white chart • A very important and helpful guide to cross stitching and the directions for starting your sampler For this pattern you need: • 14 ct aida or 28 ct linen/evenweave-white is NOT recommended due to the amount white floss used within the pattern. • Embroidery floss. The pattern contains both the DMC & Cosmo color numbers. • Embroidery hoop or frame • Scissors • Tapestry or Cross Stitch Needles Click here to purchase a Cosmo brand embroidery floss bundle kit from The Workroom - a shop in Toronto, Canada PLEASE NOTE: YOU ARE BUYING AN INSTANT DOWNLOAD PDF PATTERN.
